review_text: This is a great little chopper.  I like that it does not have a long chute sticking up on the lid.  It pulses nicely and chops up garlic and onions quickly.  I also liked that it had 2 speeds and you could pulse.  I bought it for its small size to put in my camper, but liked it so much it has a place in the house.
product_name: Cuisinart DLC-1 Mini-Prep Food Processor, White
